messages.subject: Sequel - NHK Shinsengumi!
messages.msgSnippet: A rough translation of the news... ... A sequel for Shinsengumi! announced, to be aired next January = NHK NHK has announced on the 25th that it will be
messages.messageBody:
A rough translation of the news...

----------------

A sequel for "Shinsengumi!" announced, to be aired
next January = NHK

NHK has announced on the 25th that it will be airing
in January, as a historical soap opera for New Year's,
a one-shot soap opera showing what happened after the
ending of last year's long run historical soap opera
("taiga dorama") "Shinsengumi!". It is the first time
that a sequel for historical soap operas is made.

As for the soap opera, it will feature the same cast
of the original work, including Koji Yamamoto playing
the lead role as Toshizo Hijikata. The script will be
written by Koki Mitani. It hasn't been announced the
day and time that it will be aired.


Serizawa Kamo

"I am the bone of my sword.
Steel is my body,and fire is my blood.
I have created over a thousand blades.
Unknown to Death.
Nor known to Life.
Have withstood pain to create many weapons.
Yet, those hands will never hold anyting.
So as I pray, unlimited blade works."

(Fate/Stay Night)

messages.subject: Sequel - NHK Shinsengumi!
messages.msgSnippet: Hi! I ve just seen this announcement on the NHK Shinsengumi! mailing list and thought that I should share the news. Apparently, there will be a sequel to NHK
messages.messageBody:
Hi!

I've just seen this announcement on the NHK Shinsengumi! mailing list
and thought that I should share the news.

Apparently, there will be a sequel to NHK Shinsengumi!, with the same
cast. Kouji Yamamoto (Hijikata) would be the lead actor. The official
announcement can be found at this addresse:

http://headlines.yahoo.co.jp/hl?a=20050525-00000748-jij-soci

Unfortunately, translation softwares doing a very poor job, it is
highly incomprehensible. I'm mostly relying on what people from the
other mailing list are saying, so sorry for anything that wouldn't be
accurate.

Mary-Ann
